Environment Variable Check

Client-Side Values

NEXT_PUBLIC_NEXTAUTH_URL: http://127.0.0.1:3000 window.location.origin: N/A ❌ MISMATCH

Debug Info

typeof process.env.NEXT_PUBLIC_NEXTAUTH_URL: string Value: "http://127.0.0.1:3000"

Expected vs Actual

Expected redirect_uri: http://127.0.0.1:3000/api/auth/callback/spotify ✅ CORRECT - Should send 127.0.0.1 to Spotify

Next Steps

1. Check if NEXT_PUBLIC_NEXTAUTH_URL is set above 2. Check your .env file for: NEXT_PUBLIC_NEXTAUTH_URL="http://127.0.0.1:3000" 3. If not set, stop dev server (Ctrl+C) and restart 4. If still not set, check if env file was modified after server started
